title: SD card switching, when plugin USB and choose mass storage, the download pictures and screen cuts will be saved in the phone
answer: When plugin USB cable, the SD card will be load to computer side, while the phone’s memory is FUSE form not FAT form that unable to load to computer, so only one mass memory, the main memory when plugged in PC. If not, the phone has two memories, and the SD card is the main memory. The third-party APP set the main memory as default save path, but the system program, such as camera, MMS, download of default browser, etc. will use the path “settings→storage→default memory”.
